bilingual.target: 她仔细地观察着每一个花苞。
他仔细地检查了每一个细节。
她仔细地挑选每一颗米粒。

bilingual.source: You need to plan your trip carefully.
bilingual.target: 你需要仔细地计划你的旅行。
孩子仔细地数每一颗豆子。
他非常仔细地认为她的建议。

yingyinNormal.en: No, not yet. They'll kill Toothless. No, Astrid we have to think this through carefully.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还不行，他们会杀死没牙，我们得仔细地考虑清楚。

yingyinNormal.en: Listen to me very carefully, my friend.
yingyinNormal.zh: 仔细听我说，朋友。

yingyinNormal.en: Before the ginger burns, put the fish carefully into the wok.
yingyinNormal.zh: 赶在生姜烧焦之前，小心地将鱼入锅。

yingyinNormal.en: I relied on a carefully regimented program of denial and wetting the bed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我依靠我精心策划的计划，拒绝面对现实，还有尿床。

yingyinNormal.en: 54-09 call. Go ahead. Dispatch. Listen carefully. We have a rough location.
yingyinNormal.zh: 编号54-09汇报。收到。请求支援，听仔细了，只有大致地点。

yingyinNormal.en: Is this true, Will? No. We are carefully culling our records for these files.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是真的吗？威尔。不，我们正在仔细筛选关于这些卷宗的档案记录。

yingyinNormal.en: We've discussed how important it is to reflect carefully after experiencing pain.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们已经讨论过体验痛苦后仔细思考的重要性。

yingyinNormal.en: It is coated with one of the fastest-acting neurotoxins known to man, so very carefully.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这东西上面涂有对人类最致命的神经毒素之一，千万要小心。

yingyinNormal.en: Turn here. Listen carefully. If you do exactly as I say, I can get you out of here. What?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这边转弯，好好听着，如果你完全按照我说的做，我可以帮你离开这里。你说啥？

yingyinNormal.en: Suzy Sheep is bouncing the basketball very carefully. Well done, Susie. Now, everyone try.
yingyinNormal.zh: 小羊苏西非常小心翼翼的拍着篮球。做得好，苏西。现在大家都来试试。

yingyinNormal.en: My son doesn't need your help. Tread carefully when you talk to your queen. You are my sister first.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的儿子不需要你来管。注意语气，你可是在跟王后说话。别忘了你是我妹妹。

yingyinNormal.en: Carefully turn over the fish. Lovely, lots of juice coming out, lots of sweetness from this fish, it's great.
yingyinNormal.zh: 小心地把鱼翻面。煎得很好，出了很多水，鱼肉很甘甜，好吃极了。

yingyinNormal.en: I have spent my whole life trying to bring order to the universe by carefully planning every moment of every day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我用了一生时间精心安排我每天该做什么，就是想要给这个世界带来秩序。

yingyinNormal.en: Ah, can we have our ball back please? Yes, but please play more carefully in future. Yes Mummy pig, sorry Mummy Pig.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我能把我的球拿回来吗？但是的，但是你下次玩的时候要更小一点。好的猪妈妈，对不起猪妈妈。

yingyinNormal.en: Hello? Listen carefully. I'm about to give you a set of instructions, which you must follow to the letter. Just a sec.
yingyinNormal.zh: 喂？听仔细了，我现在会给你一系列指示，你照着我说的一步步做。等会儿。

yingyinNormal.en: Right, listen to me very carefully, Kevin. The network owns you. They can sue you for damages. They could bankrupt you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，仔细听我说，凯文。电视台是你的老板，他们会起诉你赔偿损失。他们会让你倾家荡产。

yingyinNormal.en: Grandpa Pig is going to moor the boat. The secret of mooring is to do it carefully. My, the bridge. What? Look behind you. Ah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爷爷要把船给拴住。拴船的秘诀就在于要非常地小心。小心那座桥，小心你的？后面啊！

yingyinNormal.en: Now, you only get one shot to blow that audience away, so choose carefully from the list of songs I've selected for each of you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们只有一次机会征服台下的观众，所以你们要慎重选择我为你们列的曲目。

yingyinNormal.en: Your Majesty, consider your course of action carefully, seeking out good advice, and never forget the late words of the late Emperor.
yingyinNormal.zh: 陛下亦宜自谋，以咨诹善道，察纳雅言，深追先帝遗诏，

yingyinNormal.en: Because I believed your sister's indifferent to him. Indifferent? I watched them most carefully and realized his attachment was deeper than hers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我认为你姐姐觉得他无关紧要，我觉得他的爱要比她更多。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It's clear that food manufacturers must tread <highlight>carefully</highlight> when it comes to using absence claims.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: in a way that deliberately avoids harm or errors

examination_example.sentence: Dr. Michael Yogman believes the idea that parents should <highlight>carefully</highlight> schedule children's time may not be helpful to their growth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Michael Yogman博士认为，父母仔细安排孩子时间的想法可能对孩子的成长没有帮助。

examination_example.sentence: Michael Soupios suggests that we should stop and think <highlight>carefully</highlight> about our priorities in life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Michael Soupios建议我们应该停下来仔细思考一下我们生活中的优先项。

examination_example.sentence: The Department of Public Health in Boston gathers and <highlight>carefully</highlight> examines the figures and then draws its conclusions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 波士顿公共卫生部收集了这些数据并仔细核验，然后得出结论。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Any public space has been <highlight>carefully</highlight> designed by an artistic mind to be both functional and beautiful.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 任何公共空间都经过艺术头脑的精心设计，既实用又美观。

examination_example.sentence: Follow all rules <highlight>carefully</highlight> to prevent disqualification.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 请认真遵守所有规则，以免被取消资格。

examination_example.sentence: Fish and Wildlife Service <highlight>carefully</highlight> monitors and manages the wolf packs in Yellowstone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 鱼类和野生动物管理局在黄石公园对狼群进行了仔细的监控和管理。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 仔细地; 谨慎地; 小心地

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 仔细地; 谨慎地; 小心地

examination_example.sentence: If you look at their paper-cutting works <highlight>carefully</highlight>, you'll be surprised by the wonderful designs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你仔细看他们的剪纸作品，你会对精彩的设计感到惊讶。

examination_example.sentence: All in all, life is always full of beauty as long as you watch <highlight>carefully</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总而言之，只要你仔细观察，生活总是充满美好的。

examination_example.sentence: Lisa made so many mistakes in her homework, because she didn’t do it <highlight>carefully</highlight> enough.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 丽莎在作业中犯了这么多错误，因为她做得不够仔细。
